channel.title: Configuration on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: [Native] - Cash on delivery (COD) module - Available on Addons Marketplace
item.description: [Native] - Cash on delivery (COD) module - Available on Addons Marketplace Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Addons marketplace website:Â https://addons.prestashop.com/en/ The home page of Addons is displayed Click on the search bar on the header > Write “Cash on delivery” > Click on the pink arrow of the search on the right or “Enter” on your keyboard to launch the research The search page with your “cash on delivery” research is displayed Scroll down the page > Go to the “Developer” section in the facet filter on the left > Choose “PrestaShop” * The search page is filtered with the card of “Cash on delivery (COD)” module made by PrestaShop.

item.title: [Native] - Cash on delivery (COD) module - Place an order with it
item.description: [Native] - Cash on delivery (COD) module - Place an order with it Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO The home page of the shop is well displayed Scroll down on the page > Choose a product by clicking on “Quickview” > Click on “Add to cart” button on the product modal > Click on “Proceed to checkout” button on shopping cart modal The Shopping cart page is well displayed with your product on it Click on “Proceed to checkout” button on shopping cart page > Click on “Sign in” tab in “Personal information” step > Fill the form > Click on “Continue” button * You are logged in
